summary: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a half-breed prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.
cast: Franco Nero|José Bódalo|Loredana Nusciak|Ángel Álvarez|Gino Pernice|Simón Arriaga|Giovanni Ivan Scratuglia|Remo De Angelis|Rafael Albaicín|José Canalejas|Eduardo Fajardo|Silvana Bacci|Flora Carosello|Lucio De Santis|Rolando De Santis|Gilberto Galimberti|Alfonso Giganti|Cris Huerta|Giulio Maculani|Guillermo Méndez|Luciano Rossi|Yvonne Sanson|Attilio Severini|José Terrón|Rafael Vaquero
title: Django
